alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:03PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Plymouth, central Bristol and east central Providence Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 303 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rehoboth, or near Pawtucket, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, North Attleborough, Bridgewater, Attleboro, Middleborough, Easton, Norton, Somerset, Barrington, Swansea, East Bridgewater, Seekonk, Raynham, Rehoboth, Lakeville, Hanson, Freetown and Halifax. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
